name: That Dream Again
description:
DESCRIPTION
You play Avery. Haunted by a past accident, you must escape your own mind or forever be trapped. 

SOUND ON: This game uses audio to solve puzzles. 

CONTROLS: Left Click. Thats it!

CREDITS
Programming and Art: Hugging Cactus
Music: bensound.com
Sound Effects: zapsplat.com

Please no spoilers in the comments. And as always, thank you for playing.
